name: Tictac Wars
description:
Description

Tictac Wars is a game based in the classic Tic Tac Toe made in 3D with a medieval look. Just select your color and tap/click on the desired slot!

Credits

Music: steampianist (http://steampianist.newgrounds.com/) and Tomppahh(http://tomppaah.newgrounds.com/)

Logo: Clementina Villarroel (https://www.behance.net/YeyeVG)

Magic circles: Héctor Gómez (https://www.behance.net/hetogv)

SFX, 3D models: Unity Asset Store.

Tools

Unity3D 5.4 for game development, GIMP for image-processing and Audacity for audio-processing.

Enjoy!

Tomás B.
